short.ar: قم بحماية خصوصيتك على واتساب باستخدام WhatsApp Privacy Shield وامتداد Locker Chrome.

short.te: WhatsApp గోప్యతా షీల్డ్ మరియు లాకర్ Chrome పొడిగింపుతో WhatsAppలో మీ గోప్యతను రక్షించండి.

short.zh_CN,zh_TW: 使用 WhatsApp Privacy Shield 和 Locker Chrome 扩展程序保护您在 WhatsApp 上的隐私。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WhatsApp Privacy Shield and Locker is the ultimate Chrome extension for enhancing your privacy and security on WA Web. This powerful tool is designed to safeguard your sensitive information and give you control over your messaging environment. Whether you're working in a public space or sharing your device, our extension ensures that your personal chats and data remain private.

Key Features:
Enhanced Privacy Controls: Blur sensitive elements of your WhatsApp Web interface, including the last message preview, text chats, media gallery, profile pictures, and group/user names. Choose what you want to keep private with simple toggle options.

Dynamic Unblur on Hover: Need to take a quick peek? Our smart unblur-on-hover feature allows you to temporarily reveal any blurred element by simply hovering your cursor over it, providing ease without compromising privacy.
Password-Protected Access: Lock your WhatsApp Web with a robust password to prevent unauthorized access. Create and set your own password, lock your WA with a click, and enjoy peace of mind knowing that your conversations are secure.
Two UI Modes: Switch between Dark and Light modes to customize the appearance of your extension interface according to your preference or lighting conditions.
Privacy-First Policy: We value your privacy. WhatsApp Privacy Shield and Locker does not read your messages, nor does it store locker passwords on servers. Your password is securely encrypted and stored locally in your browser.

Why Choose WhatsApp Privacy Shield and Locker?

Immediate Privacy: Instantly enhance your privacy with easy-to-use controls.

User-Centric Design: Tailored for both casual users and privacy enthusiasts.

Seamless Integration: Works effortlessly with WhatsApp Web without affecting performance.

Trustworthy Security: Built with leading encryption technologies for maximum security.

Installation and Setup:
Getting started is simple. Just add WhatsApp Privacy Shield and Locker to your Chrome browser, and activate the extension on WhatsApp Web. Configure your privacy settings and password in just a few clicks, and you're all set to go!

Disclaimer:
We are committed to protecting your privacy. The extension read your messages or any information.

Download Now and Take Control of Your Online Privacy!
Enhance your WhatsApp Web experience with unparalleled privacy and security. Try WhatsApp Privacy Shield and Locker today and step into a safer messaging world.

Legal Disclaimer:
WhatsApp Privacy Shield is an independent project and is not affiliated with or endorsed by WhatsApp Inc. WhatsApp is a trademark of WhatsApp Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries. This extension is designed to provide additional privacy features for WhatsApp Web users and has no direct relationship with the official WhatsApp application.
